pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:6.1: Ime kho panāyyāyo tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:7.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:7.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo bahū patte sannicayaṃ karonti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:7.3: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:7.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bahū patte sannicayaṃ karissanti, pattavāṇijjaṃ vā bhikkhuniyo karissanti, āmattikāpaṇaṃ vā pasāressantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:8.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:8.4: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo pattasannicayaṃ karissantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:8.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo pattasannicayaṃ karontī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:8.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo pattasannicayaṃ karissanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:8.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:8.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:9.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī pattasannicayaṃ kareyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:11.5: ukkaṭṭho patto, majjhimo patto, omako patto.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:11.7: aḍḍhāḷhakodanaṃ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṃ khādanaṃ tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:11.9: nāḷikodanaṃ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṃ khādanaṃ tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:11.11: patthodanaṃ gaṇhāti catubhāgaṃ khādanaṃ tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:13.3: Nissajjitabbo saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:13.5: Tāya bhikkhuniyā saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:13.6: “ayaṃ me, ayye, patto rattātikkanto nissaggiyo, imāhaṃ saṃghassa nissajjāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:14.2: Ayaṃ patto itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā nissaggiyo saṃghassa nissaṭṭho.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:14.3: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho imaṃ pattaṃ itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā dadeyyā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:15.1: Tāya bhikkhuniyā sambahulā bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā vuḍḍhānaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassu vacanīyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:15.2: “ayaṃ me, ayyāyo, patto rattātikkanto nissaggiyo, imāhaṃ ayyānaṃ nissajjāmī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:16.2: Ayaṃ patto itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā nissaggiyo ayyānaṃ nissaṭṭho.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:16.3: Yadi ayyānaṃ pattakallaṃ, ayyāyo, imaṃ pattaṃ itthannāmāya bhikkhuniyā dadeyyun”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:17.1: Tāya bhikkhuniyā ekaṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyā—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:19.1: Nissaggiyaṃ pattaṃ anissajjitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:20.2: antoaruṇe adhiṭṭheti, vikappeti, vissajjeti, nassati, vinassati, bhijjati, acchinditvā gaṇhanti, vissāsaṃ gaṇhanti, ummattikāya, ādikammikāyāti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:21.1: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo nissaṭṭhapattaṃ na denti.
